title: Definition of a statistic
text: The statistic is the measured value from the sample. It measures exactly the same thing as the parameter does, just for a subset of the population.

title: Identitfying Statistic
text: What is the statistic in this study? As a value that measures a sample from the population, does the statistic measure the average cumulative GPA of all students who ATTENDED the college last year, all students who GRAUDATED the college last year, or students from the STUDY who graduated the college last year?
